name: Crystallite
description: The Crystallite is a Large Giant resembling a massive geode when still, embodying a mix of crystal and earthy hues.
memorable: Unique transformation upon death into a crystal object, presenting a secondary challenge.
goals: To ambush opponents, grappling them and absorbing their lifeforce.
relations: May be encountered with other crystalline or earth-themed creatures.
environment: Often found in mountainous or rocky terrains.
strengths: Exceptional melee combat prowess and the ability to regain health through absorption of lifeforce.
weaknesses: Slow movement and low dexterity make it less evasive in combat.
attacks: Multiattack with Crystal Limb strikes that can grapple and cause piercing and slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Biomineralize, which not only drains life but also permanently reduces the target's maximum hit points.
senses: Possesses tremorsense, allowing it to detect movement through vibrations.
skills: No notable skill proficiencies beyond average perception.
additional_information: Immunities to poison damage and poisoned condition.
Resistance to cold and fire damage.
Grappling attacks impale targets, creating urgency to escape.
False Appearance allows it to camouflage with surroundings.
Final Form turns it into a crystal object upon death.
test_queries: giant that grapples and absorbs life
